alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 10:51AM EDT until June 16 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... South central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Eastern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 1145 AM EDT/1045 AM CDT/. * At 1050 AM EDT/950 AM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Hartford to near Vernon to 17 miles northwest of Lynn Haven to 12 miles west of Panama City Beach, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Bonifay, Blountstown, Marianna, Chipley, Graceville, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Bradford, Parker, Malone and Wewahitchka. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington
